reviewText: If you don't understand modern dance or know how to approach understanding it, this is THE video to watch.  Each piece has an introduction that explains where in her career the piece was created, and what the influences were.  The range of dances is a true feast, covering dances inspired by such things as painting, travel, and mythology.  A treasure!!

This concert of the prestigious Martha Gaham Dance Company, is a very good example of the range of her work.
The dancers are very strong, and give you a very good version of what the Graham Company was.
With Diversion of Angels, to Maple Leaf Rag, you will be able to get an idea of the Artist, Martha Graham, who brought Drama to Theater, and Dance.
Enjoy!
